title: FS: T205 Christy Mathewson w/ Cycle back PSA 1  **SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Christy Mathewson w/ Cycle back PSA 1  **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T205 card available for sale. Scans should accurately reflect the condition. 

I will cover insured shipping. I accept payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

Also, there are still lots of good deals to be had on my previous much larger groups, featuring many other HOF'ers, rarities, and short prints. Please feel free to take a look at those at these links:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=176549[/url]

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=176215[/url]

PRICE IS **SOLD**  Thanks for looking!

Mathewson (Cycle "37-1" variation) 

Nice looking PSA 1, could easily bump to a 2...very similar to this one that sold earlier this year for $2670 with Mile High  [url]http://www.milehighcardco.com/LotDetail.aspx?lotid=28805[/url]
Bump for a price reduction.  Thanks for looking!
Bump for another price reduction.  Now $2100 delivered.  Thanks for looking!
